title: We Are Getting Married
wedding-venue: Convention Heritz 2nd fl. Agnes Hall, South Korea
groom-desc-2: who made me want to give my everything.
bride-desc-2: who I can constantly laugh with.
intro-1: On the first day of the two of us
intro-3: making a promise to become one,
intro-4: I would appreciate it if you could come and bless us
intro-5: together to serve each other and share love around us.
venue-address: Heritz Tower, 662, Nonhyeon-ro, Gangnam-gu, Seoul, South Korea
subway-case-1: - Walk 60m from Exit 3 of Hakdong Station on Line 7
subway-case-2: - Walk 500m from Exit 3 of Eonju Station on Line 9
car-case-3: - There may be a 10-20 minute delay when using the parking lot.
lunch-notice-desc-1: The buffet is available from 12:00 to 14:00 in the banquet hall on the third floor.
lunch-notice-desc-2: Please note that you cannot re-enter, so please be aware.
parking-notice-desc-1: Park in the wedding hall building,
parking-notice-desc-3: Park in the outside parking lot, guided by the wedding hall attendant
parking-notice-desc-4: -> Stamp the parking pass on any floor of the wedding hall, it is free for two hours.
